poemsDataJson.list_full: 恋(こひ)すてふ わが名(な)はまだき 立(た)ちにけり 人(ひと)知(し)れずこそ 思(おも)ひそめしか
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: It is true I love,//But the rumor of my love//Had gone far and wide,//When people should not have known//That I had begun to love.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Koisu chō|Waga na wa madaki|Tachi ni keri|Hito shirezu koso|Omoi some shika
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: ひとしれすこそ おもひそめしか
poemsDataJson.author: 壬生忠見(みぶのただみ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: ひそかな恋が人の噂になってしまったことへの当惑
